name: PageContentCollection
description: Represents the contents of a page, as a collection of PageContent objects.

properties.name: count
properties.description: Returns the number of page contents in the collection.

methods.name: getItem
methods.description: Gets a PageContent object by ID or by its index in the collection. Read-only.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The ID of the PageContent object, or the index location of the PageContent object in the collection.

methods.name: getItemAt
methods.description: Gets a page content on its position in the collection.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: Index value of the object to be retrieved. Zero-indexed.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
